Text: Re administrative claimspg e Cc Lisa I am comfortable that the order setting the administrative claim bar date applies only to claims arising from the postpetition sale of power through the CAISO My understanding based on an email from John is that power sales under bilateral contracts such as the EPMI power contract do not go through the ISO Assuming that is correct and if John or Elizabeth disagree please let me know immediately I am comfortable that there is no need to file an administrative claim for power sales under the EPMI contract for the period April to April Similarly the postpetition negative CTC claim does not arise from the sale of power through the ISO Thus there is no need to file an administrative claim for it at this time Ben Bennett G Young One Embarcadero Center Suite San Francisco California Mellencamp Lisa Lisa NRONcom PM i believe you are comfortable that we do not need to file an administrative negative ctc adm claim please confirm please confirm that we do not need to file one for the postpetition sales you left me message about call elizabeth if need to confirm This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you This email including attachments contains information that is confidential and may be protected by the attorneyclient or other privileges This email including attachments constitutes nonpublic information intended to be conveyed only to the designated recipients If you are not an intended recipient please delete this email including attachments and notify me The unauthorized use dissemination distribution or reproduction of this email including attachments is prohibited and may be unlawful
